Articles.Content: [http://www.twitch.tv/smokingooba?tt_medium=live_embed&tt_content=text_link](Watch live video from SmokinGooba on www.twitch.tv SmokinGooba is a regular KSP streamer who loves marathon streams (today he streamed for over 14 hours!). Gooba streams with an interesting selection of mods and is very interactive with his audience so give his channel a watch.

> 
> [SQUAD. I am very disappointed.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128453-Suggestion-Daily-Kerbal-Replace-the-Twitch-Thursday-with-a-Spacecraft-Thursday)

Ditto, though it may take some time for them to work this out (If they ever decide to do so).
I'm very disappointed that the first two responses are completely negative. SmokinGooba has my follow and I hope to catch one of his streams soon.

> 
> [SQUAD. I am very disappointed.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128453-Suggestion-Daily-Kerbal-Replace-the-Twitch-Thursday-with-a-Spacecraft-Thursday)

Thirded. Still don't understand the allure of watching others play a game you presumably already have.
Hey, come on guys, even if this is not what you want you must still give credit to the people featured. They don't deserve meanness.
